company.name: Midtown Commercial Real Estate
company.tagline: Take Your Business to a Better Space
company.description: Midtown Commercial Real Estate is New York's boutique tenant and landlord representative helping to service your every need! With over 30 years in the industry and having worked with over 2 million square feet of space, we have the experience needed to service your requests. Our firm is composed of over 10 highly experienced brokers, each specialized in specific sectors of commercial real estate.
company.address: 450 Seventh Avenue, Suite 2702, New York, New York 10123

hero.headline: New York's boutique tenant and landlord representative
hero.subheadline: Take your business to a better space! Midtown Commercial Real Estate represents tenants and landlords in fulfilling their property needs.

about.headline: Who Are We
about.content: Midtown Commercial Real Estate is New York's boutique tenant and landlord representative helping to service your every need! With over 30 years in the industry and having worked with over 2 million square feet of space, we have the experience needed to service your requests. Our firm is composed of over 10 highly experienced brokers, each specialized in specific sectors of commercial real estate. We walk tenants through each step of the process, working to identify properties that fit their unique business needs.

values.title: Tenant Representation
values.description: At no cost to the tenant, we find you the perfect property for your business

values.title: Landlord Representation
values.description: We give landlords more by helping identify quality tenants for their properties

values.title: 30+ Years Experience
values.description: Over 2 million square feet of space handled with specialized expertise
